General.Name: UNIBEP S.A.
General.Description: UNIBEP S.A. operates as a construction company in Poland, Sweden, Belarus, Ukraine, Germany, Norway, and internationally. The company constructs houses, apartments, public utility buildings, industrial projects, roads and bridges, sports facilities, and modular construction projects, as well as hotels, offices, and retail and service facilities. UNIBEP S.A. is headquartered in Bielsk Podlaski, Poland.
